[Novo](/company/getnovo "Novo")
[HIRING](/company/getnovo/careers)

Senior Backend Engineer

**Aug 2023 - Present (1 yr, 2 m) • bangalore urban, india • full-time**

Download more icon variants from https://tabler-icons.io/i/chevron-down

**Putting "Tech" into FinTech at Novo** — my primary responsibility is to build & scale a better platform to empower customers with their financial data and provide the most compelling banking experience possible.

![NodeJS icon](https://d26c7l40gvbbg2.cloudfront.net/tool_icons/nodejs.svg)NodeJS![AWS icon](https://d26c7l40gvbbg2.cloudfront.net/tool_icons/aws.svg)AWS![GraphQL icon](https://d26c7l40gvbbg2.cloudfront.net/tool_icons/graphql.svg)GraphQL![Kafka icon](https://d26c7l40gvbbg2.cloudfront.net/tool_icons/kafka.svg)KafkaMicroservices

[Postman](/company/postman "Postman")
[HIRING](/company/postman/careers)

Software Engineer II

**Apr 2021 - Aug 2023 (2 yr, 4 m) • bengaluru, india • full-time**

Download more icon variants from https://tabler-icons.io/i/chevron-down

Integrations are an integral part of any developer's workflow. Having said that, I author integrations to connect user's API workflow with their favourite applications/services seamlessly with Postman.

![JavaScript icon](https://d26c7l40gvbbg2.cloudfront.net/tool_icons/javascript.svg)JavaScript![AWS icon](https://d26c7l40gvbbg2.cloudfront.net/tool_icons/aws.svg)AWS![ReactJS icon](https://d26c7l40gvbbg2.cloudfront.net/tool_icons/reactjs.svg)ReactJS![NodeJS icon](https://d26c7l40gvbbg2.cloudfront.net/tool_icons/nodejs.svg)NodeJSMicroservices

Software Engineer

**Jun 2019 - Apr 2021 (1 yr, 10 m) • bengaluru, india • full-time**

Download more icon variants from https://tabler-icons.io/i/chevron-down

Making API calls in the context of the browser’s session is a common use case. I integrated the existing popular Postman Interceptor extension for the legacy Chrome App with the native app. It mainly supports two features:

*   Capture browser traffic directly into Postman
    
*   Sync browser cookies directly into Postman
    

![JavaScript icon](https://d26c7l40gvbbg2.cloudfront.net/tool_icons/javascript.svg)JavaScript![Jasmine icon](https://d26c7l40gvbbg2.cloudfront.net/tool_icons/jasmine.svg)Jasmine![SASS icon](https://d26c7l40gvbbg2.cloudfront.net/tool_icons/sass.svg)SASS![Electron icon](https://d26c7l40gvbbg2.cloudfront.net/tool_icons/electron.svg)Electron

Software Engineering Intern

**Nov 2018 - Jun 2019 (7 m) • bengaluru,india • full-time**

Download more icon variants from https://tabler-icons.io/i/chevron-down

![JavaScript icon](https://d26c7l40gvbbg2.cloudfront.net/tool_icons/javascript.svg)JavaScript![CSS icon](https://d26c7l40gvbbg2.cloudfront.net/tool_icons/css.svg)CSS![Postman icon](https://d26c7l40gvbbg2.cloudfront.net/tool_icons/postman.svg)Postman![Git icon](https://d26c7l40gvbbg2.cloudfront.net/tool_icons/git.svg)Git![Bitbucket icon](https://d26c7l40gvbbg2.cloudfront.net/tool_icons/bitbucket.svg)Bitbucket

Education

Vellore Institute Technology

Bachelor of Technology (BTech),  Information Technology

2015 - 2019

Delhi Public School

Senior School Certificate Examination (CBSE),  Science

2012 - 2014

Certification

Winner - Smart India Hackathon 2020 (Mentor)

SIH India

Jul 2020 -

Programming Foundations with JavaScript, HTML and CSS

Coursera

Mar 2018 -

Oracle Work Force Development Programme in Java

Oracle

Jul 2017 -

Volunteering

Mentor

Google Summer Of Code

Mar 2023 - Present

Download more icon variants from https://tabler-icons.io/i/chevron-down

Open API Web Search project is all about providing a simple way for developers to find existing **Swagger** and **OpenAPI** definitions on the open web—mostly from lesser-known sources.

The ultimate goal of this project is to build a search engine for APIs where API consumers and producers can discover APIs using keywords that abstract away the complexity of searching the web for specific terms, helping identify APIs in a sea of web pages.

Community Manager

Road to Hacktoberfest

Sep 2021 - Nov 2021

Download more icon variants from https://tabler-icons.io/i/chevron-down

Started a community-led mentorship initiative for helping beginners kickstarting their open-source journey by completing their Hacktoberfest'21 challenge with an optimistic goal of

  

*   100 Mentors
*   1000 Contributors
*   250 Projects
*   500 Issues
*   50 Events

Mentor

Google Summer Of Code

Mar 2021 - May 2021

Download more icon variants from https://tabler-icons.io/i/chevron-down

Postman and AsyncAPI are collaborating together for Google Summer Of Code 2021. I'm glad to mentor one of the idea for AsyncAPI i.e. building a library which compares two AsyncAPI Documents and generates diff between the two.

Project Admin

GirlScript Summer Of Code

Jan 2020 - Mar 2020

Download more icon variants from https://tabler-icons.io/i/chevron-down

GirlScript Summer of Code is the 3 month-long Open Source program conducted by GirlScript Foundation with an aim to help beginners get started with Open Source.

  

My project, **Water Monitoring System** is selected for GSSoC 2020 - Water Monitoring System is an IOT based Liquid Level Monitoring system that has mechanisms to keep the user alerted in case of liquid overflow or when tank depletes.

  

Goals of this project :

  

• To reduce the wastage of water across the city

• To provide better water supply to the people

GitHub Star

GitHub

Feb 2019 - Present

Download more icon variants from https://tabler-icons.io/i/chevron-down

I contribute towards promoting open-source among beginners and making GitHub a better place for developers.

Show All Download more icon variants from https://tabler-icons.io/i/chevron-down
